Name: Oberweis
Tips: It’s Oberweis guys !!!| It’s better than Namur. The Knippecher are less sweet and more complex. The lemon tart is great too.| Необычные и очень вкусные пирожные, советую очень!| В принципе вкусно, но не так чтобы Вау-вау-вау, ждали заказ в пятницу днём довольно долго| Doces deliciosos!!

Name: Cereal Lovers
Tips: Cosy little cafe. Friendly staff and wide selection of various cookies.| The cutest coffeeshop of Luxembourg on a cute, little square. Huge pieces of pie and delicious iced coffee. 🍑🧋| Very good americano and bagel with cream cheese. The patio is also super nice to relax for awhile.| Coffee is very good| Great coffee and in a cosy courtyard - good place for reading books! They have oat milk for coffee and do not charge extra, very lovely little place

Name: Um Dierfgen
Tips: Highly recommend the Judd mat Gaardebounen!| Horse steak was really good... also the smoked pork neck. Good and friendly service| Cozy place with good traditional food and mussels.| Horse Steak = awesomeness

Name: Ladurée
Description: Idéal pour une halte sucrée, notre salon de thé Ladurée vous offre un lieu d'exception où déguster vos macarons, pâtisseries, viennoiseries, ainsi que vos plats préférés, accompagnées d’une boisson chaude ou froide.
Tips: El macaroon Ispahan es lo más delicioso!!!😘😘😘😘😘| Macarons are great for sure. Slow and bad service in the cafe| Was soll man sagen, sehr leckere Macarons. Und die haben ihren Preis, sind aber auch ideale Mitbringsel für die Lieben zu Hause.| Good as always, not that cheap as I would like it to be though 😂| Place for princesses :) I prefer cakes from Oberweis, but this is classic..

Name: Urban Bar
Tips: Very packed and pretentious service.| Good beers, mostly sulky staff and cosy atmosphere. You need to make a reservation for the outside.| Great place, very chill, excellent service, good selections, and relaxing ambience| Nice vibes.  Great food.  Different beers on draft.| It was perfect by all means! The food,drink,waiters,decoration,background music...I tried their entrecote & it was one of the best I ever had! & the price is really cheaper than the quality they offer

Name: Bazaar
Tips: Great place for sharing mezze.| This place has a really cool atmosphere and has many great vegetarian and even some vegan options. I would definitely recommend sharing a few different plates with friends.| Fantastic place, cool ambience, nice service, and good selections| Cocktails are great, food is tasty, but price-quantity-quality should be revisited. Fancy people| Bonne ambiance, cadre sympa !!

Name: De Gudde Wëllen Terrasse (Corniche)
Tips: Großartige Aussicht und sehr nettes Personal| Sometimesnice comcerts. Good homemade rums :)| It's a bar with cool atmosphere, music and people. They have live acts and DJs every now and then playing various styles. One of the few alternative options in the city.| Somehow nice and cozy place and they have good beers.| The Okult beer is an awesome choice :)

Name: Ambrosia
Tips: Настоящий греческий ресторан каким он должен быть с большими порциями| Kalamar enfes yanında salata ve uzo 👍🏻 siparişiniz gelene kadar zeytinyağına sıcak ekmeğinizi ya da sarımsaklı pitanızı banıp yiyebilirsiniz 😋 (deniz mahsülü sevmiyorsanız mutlaka kuzuyu deneyin)| Great Greek restaurant. Reservation may be needed. If not, better to go early.| Service, Food, Price!!!| Mezeler süper mutlaka

Name: Cafés Knopes
Formatted Address: Avenue de la Porte Neuve, 2227 Lëtzebuerg
Tips: Great taste of the coffee| Finally a place that smells of real good coffee in Luxembourg!| Cappuccino is good| Coffee is fine, but the place is too small and crowded, you have to sit near the door, no toilet.| They make the best cappucino in Luxembourg. The free biscuit they have by the door is delicious!

Name: Aka Cité
Tips: Fish is very fresh and good quality but the Sushiskills are very bad...| Very good japanese food! Excellent sushi and maki rolls! A must try in Luxemburg! 👌🏻🍣| The spicy beef is delicious!| Deliciousssss!!!!!!| Sushi Train Avrupa'da ki en iyi uygulaması ...sıcak samimi leziz 👍👏

Name: Cafe Restaurant Bodega
Tips: Belle adresse tout en simplicité, un accueil du tonnerre et un excellent rapport qualité prix| Good food and price 👌🏻| good food/price but it took 45' to arrive , maybe because it is Saturday, not all the tables were full. I 'll try again definerely. Minus the behavior of the moustache waiter after a simple question.| Awesome steaks! The house red gets you some bang for your buck too at just €13 a bottle...lovely stuff.

Name: Kaale Kaffi
Tips: Love this place from the day one in Luxembourg- stylish, with character and soul. Serves tea any time of day or night :)| Fantastic decor for a great coffee experience!| Fantastic decor and ambience for a great coffee experience. A real highlight of our trip.| Cozy place, great stuff| Cosy environment (love the books and music choice), easy location, limited and decent/average drink options (coffee and cocktails/wine) - good to hang with friends for a chat or relax with a computer.

Name: Mamacita
Tips: Guacamole is absolutely amazing. However, tacos looked more like quesadillas - and not the good ones. Best to stick to fajitas that were very good. 1 waiter was very rude.| Great staff, nice tacos.| Really good mexican food!| Guacamole & michelada👍🏻| Ask for the home made habanero sauce!

Name: L'Osteria
Tips: Good quality, friendly stuff. Little expensive though.| Delicious tiramisu 😋😋😋| Simple pasta and grilled fish (the latter from Brasserie Guillaume next door)| Excellent food and service. A little pricey by American standards, but worth every €.| Osso bucco yemelisiniz...muhteşem 👍servis ilgi alaka hoş...özetle nezih şehirde nezih mekan👍

Name: Um Plateau Sàrl
Tips: Octopus burger| Tasteful food and nice atmosphere, the Terrasse is comfy too!| This place is great! Very nice ambience, delicious food, excellent gin selection| The starters| Très beau cadre, magnifique terrasse, grand choix de vin, tapas originaux et délicieux, une adresse à recommander sans modération :)

Name: Vis-à-Vis
Tips: Nothing special but seems to attract quite a few people| Traditional city pub with a mixed international crowd| Great staff, great location. Try to get a spot at the efdge of the terrace around the end of the afternoon.| Good atmosphere, nice staff| Luxembourg City really feels like a European city from this venue. Great vibe and views

Name: Bella Ciao
Tips: Great Italian Restaurant. The King Truffle Pizza is just awesome. At least if you like a ton of truffle 😁| Gnocchi 4 cheese is beautiful, I would skip the bruschetta next time, nothing special! Great service, very fast! Really nice place

Name: Dean & David
Tips: Свежие салаты, вкусные огромные порции| Salataları güzel| Typical D&D - healthy food and relaxed atmosphere, all conveniently located in the city center.

Name: Kaempff-Kohler
Tips: Great Mexican wrap| Looks tasty that it tasty though. But lovely place to gab a coffee| Very Nice place to enjoy cheese and wine. Hicham, the cheese master, is very Nice, helpful. The service was very good.| The unfriendly, not helpful and arrogant service hurts. It’s unfortunate that Luxembourg’s great cheese stores are disappearing and we are left with this kinda business. Farmer’s market: best option!| Place for cheese lovers. Bliss!

Name: Mesa Verde
Tips: Great restaurant! Perfect for almost all "diets" (veggie, vegan, fish..)| Service is kinda slow but hey, you are in a vegetarian, slow food is supposed to be the concept. The food is excellent, albeit somewhat overpriced. Romantic outdoor summer seating at night.| Nous y sommes allés à trois, pour diner, tout était bon, nos trois plats, les desserts, le service, l'ambiance.Vraiment sympa.| Very slow service, food ok but really overpriced. My wife had the seitan with shitake mushrooms and they put other mushrooms instead. Not a pleasant experience overall| Best restaurant in town

Name: Vins Fins
Tips: Cosy little nook with - indeed - fine wines but also snacks| Cosy environment| Great little place! Friendly service| Nice location, good wines, good carpaccio| Très bel endoit

Name: Glacier Bargello
Tips: Fui numa tarde de sábado e o atendimento foi ótimo. E o sorvete é muito bom.| Fui numa tarde de sábado e o atendimento foi ótimo. E o glace é muito saboroso.| Hervorragendes Eis. Sehr zu empfehlen. Im Hinterhof gibt es eine kleine, sonnige (bis ca 16 Uhr) und ruhige Terrasse| Shame you can only choose one flavour in the €3.50 pot! Makes it expensive and much less fun.| Sorbet 1A lecker!

Name: Scott's Pub
Tips: The Real Pub in Luxembourg. Great view on the river from the terrasse.| The beuf tartar is incredible. It uses sliced beef instead of minced and the taste is otherworldly| Friendly staff, very tasty food. We order the spare ribs which were out of this world amazing- highly recommended! Also the beet tartare was very delicious!Try the Goose IPA to accompany the ribs!!| You pay 4€ for a fizzy water. So it’s best to get a beer instead.| Bad service. Period

Name: Oscar's Bar
Tips: Classical pub...| I have been coming to this place for over 10 years but i guess lately it sucks... the waiters are rude, food is late.| I ate the Chimichanga as the meal of the day and it was great!| Food here is OK. Dont expect any high quality stuff. It is just OK| Good burgers, nice wraps. Good brunch on Sunday !

Name: Madeira Stuff
Tips: The food is amazing! The tuna steak is a must. Try the 'bolo do caco' typical from Madeira.

Name: The Tube
Tips: Nice Pub in Luxembourg. Good music and good range of drinks.| Make sure you don’t get robbed here…| Crowded on Friday and Saturday - great place to hang out and for a couple of drinks| Good pub with a great beer selection. Bar itself is sadly expensive and small.| Irish themed bar, pulls a crowd, service okish, beers poorly handled on tap, stick to bottles.

Name: Brasserie Schuman
Tips: Great place| The bar and terrace are both very nice and the menu is trimmed to only a few high-quality options.| Great terrace in the summer, and lovely food! Cosy inside too with nice staff.| Good place to go on a summer evening, there's a big terrasse to enjoy the sun and drinks!| Classy terrace, good food and drinks

Name: Il Punto
Tips: For lunch, I can highly recommend this small but nice Italian restaurant, where I go often. Everything on the menu is good :-)| Breakfast menu of coffee, fresh orange juice and croissant for EUR 5. Not bad at all!| TOUT EST BON| Tout est bon.Specialités: Pâtes et Pizzas!| Best pasta napoletana and arrabbiata

Name: Himalaya
Tips: Great vindaloo and naan. Attentive service, too.| Vegetable samosas, cheese naan and palek paneer were all great!| This is a recommendable place with decent Nepalese/Indian food. Excellent service level, good price/quality ratio. The interior itself is rather basic.| Delicious 😋| Good service, had chicken vindaloo, great!

Name: Bagatelle X Knopes
Tips: Concept-store right next to the train station with excellent coffee.| Piccolo and lemon cake| Still, the best coffee in the city.| Excellent coffee in a fun setting. Great quality all around.

Name: Restaurant Amelys
Tips: Delicious dishes and impeccable service. The lamb was juicy and tender.| Excellent breakfast buffet with lots of delicious and fresh options.

Name: Rocas
Tips: Wednesday nights for jam sessions,  and Thursday/Fridays  for house music!| For every taste something, lots of events, bit shabby but a great craft beer list!| Chouette endroit pour un concert ou passer une soirée musicalement intéressante| Very good Techno & Electro nights, great people and environment. Free and open Wifi for those who can't live without their fancy phones.| Best cider in town. Quiet in the afternoon, concerts and DJs in the evening.

Name: Batucada
Tips: caipirinha| Resto sympa, quantités plus qu’assez et vrai choix pour les végétariens :)| Really good cachaça| Really good food with a big portion.| Same chain as Devil’s Kitchen and others with - largely - the same menu and middle-to-low quality.

Name: Apoteca
Tips: Best club in Lux| La rumba es buenísima! Si llegas antes de las 11 Pm, no pagas cover!| Rhum 23 anos e cohiba| Die vielleicht schönste Location in Luxemburg-Stadt. Super Cocktails und am Wochenende spielen immer gute Dj's.| Les beaux jours de ce club sont derrière lui !

Name: Cocottes Chimay
Tips: Take-away style. Fresh and original combo’s. Good selection of non-alcoholic beverages.

Name: Interview
Tips: Great place, nice people!| Watch out when you stand up, the lights are a tad low.| one of the last cafés where you can drink and smoke during lunch time!! ;-)) nice people and service| Indeed the best Capuccino of the galaxy!| In the really hot days, ask for a pint of ice/perrier/orangina, and sit on the bench with the large window opened. Stare at passer-bys. Bliss ;)

Name: L'annexe
Tips: Lieu magnifique, belle vue sur le vieux Luxembourg, une cuisine sublime, a la fois magnifique avec une présentation digne d’un étoilé et au gout delicieu, les desserts incroyable. 👍👍👍👍👍👍🥰| Not a good place if you are looking for a lunch in less than 1h| Hidden Place with no tourists and great food. Take the risotto and the tuna steak - simply perfect!| Risotto is great

Name: Exki
Description: EXKi is a high-quality fast food restaurant offering natural, fresh products at all times of the day, in a pleasant, relaxing, environment. Our motto is natural, fresh & ready.
Tips: Selection of food is good| Great organic and vegan offers. Cold and hot, soups, salads and desserts. Not very expensive and tasty. Absolutely recommended!| If you’re looking for quick various vegetarian and vegan options then look no further.| Good fresh smoothies, decent coffee.| Healthy fast food :) Some foods and desserts really taste very ok.

Name: La Lorraine
Tips: The slowest service we have seen in a long time. Understaffed. Right on the Place d‘Armes.| Beer is good.| Excellent, perfect service| Lack of communication between staff.  My fish is over heated due to the fact that the food come too early before finishing my starter.  Food 5.5/10, ambience 6/10, service 4/10, value for money 5/10.| Great seafood & fish options, pop in for lunch if you're in the neighbourhood

Name: Paname
Formatted Address: 50 Rue Sainte Zithe Place de Paris, 2763 Lëtzebuerg
Tips: Enjoyin after 22| Apesar de ficarem abertos até às 01h, a cozinha fecha as 22h e não servem mais nada!| Café/bar ouvert tard avec terrasse sympa.| Food is a bit unsalty….| Make a reservation to be sure you get a place... otherwise it’s a lottery

Name: Indie's
Tips: Amazing food everything fresh taste good. Perfect place| Good place for a laid back beer, food is average bar food quality.| Nice venue, perfect for a drink with friends.| Très bon hamburger végétarien (le Forest il me semble, avec plein de champignons !). J'ai beaucoup apprécié qu'ils aient plusieurs plats végétariens et même vegan à la carte.| Food is fine, atmosphere is okay. Not as characteristic as other places in the area.

Name: BANGKOK Thai-Brasserie
Tips: N/A

Name: Hitch
Tips: Their own Hitch beer is great| Very good and quick service. Delicious burgers. Meat is good quality and perfectly cooked. Recommended.| Perfect service and awesome waiters! Really nice place and good vegetarian options.| This is a nightclub after about 10 pm.  A bit of a pick up joint.| Cosy with good service and nice food. Menu not big but everything we tried was tasty.

Name: Updown bar
Tips: Very relaxed atmosphere. Simple grilled dishes. Very affordable for Luxembourg…| Good local cider with a price lower than everywhere and very nice and friendly stuff. The girl working here even shared WiFi from her phone because bar's WiFi didn't work outside for some reason| Sélection gin / rhum excellent| Friendly evironment| Not the best option in the area for a drink...

Name: Barrels
Tips: Super cool but expensive| Wine and food| A bit expensive. A lot of nice wine choices.| Great wine choice. Every month, a new region of the world is brought to your attention with selected wines. Love the atmosphere with barrels everywhere

Name: Charles Sandwiches
Tips: Tuna mix sandwich! We ate it at 2pm and then we didn’t need a dinner! So delicious and nutritious!| Charles is the go to location when for teens in Luxembourg. Their sandwiches are impeccable and a great fill up. If you’re looking for a healthy alternative the Caesar salad is the way to go.| I came here with my gal pals to enjoy a nice lunch in between classes. I was thoroughly disappointed with the service, it was incredibly slow and the waitress was unfriendly. Would not recommend!

Name: L'Observatoire
Description: World-class mixology, a futuristic design and tasty menu makes this trendy bar a popular Luxembourg hotspot - and a sophisticated space for a sunset drink.
Tips: OMG THAT VIEW!!! (Best during daylight hours)| Nette Bar.| Great venue with incredible view but expensive prices| Right bar with a right bar menu, design and view.| Fantastic view over the valley.

Name: Siegfried Von Westeschgaart
Tips: You get a popcorns with a beer!

Name: Metropolitan
Tips: A diverse selection of eats with reasonable prices given the location. Cozy and clean, but not ostentatious.| Nice place for evening drink, pleasant barman, really tasty tapas. Coffee Illy is a good one| Fairly priced| Good lunch menu, if you excuse the 1970s disco soundtrack

Name: Rock Box
Formatted Address: 2, Rue Emile Mousel les Rives de Clausen, 2165 Lëtzebuerg
Tips: No food, but you're allowed to bring some in from elsewhere. Good liquor selection and a decent list of LUX beers to choose from!| Музыка, бесплатный попкорн| My favourite Rock bar ever.
